languages.text: "Разве тебе есть что скрывать от своих слуг?" {n}Маражай тонко улыбается вам, не оставляя ни малейших сомнений в том, что его появление на заполоненном мостике — его намерение, а не ошибка.{/n}
"Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Разве тебе есть что скрывать от своих слуг?" {n}Маражай тонко улыбается вам, не оставляя ни малейших сомнений в том, что его появление на заполоненном мостике — его намерение, а не ошибка.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “在你的仆人面前，还有什么需要遮遮掩掩的吗？”{n}玛拉斋露出一抹淡漠的微笑。这让你确信，他出现在拥挤的舰桥上绝非疏漏，而是有意为之。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在你的仆人面前，还有什么需要遮遮掩掩的吗？”{n}玛拉斋露出一抹淡漠的微笑。这让你确信，他出现在拥挤的舰桥上绝非疏漏，而是有意为之。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Tienes algo que ocultar a tus sirvientes?». {n}Marazhai te ofrece una tenue sonrisa, dejando bien claro que su aparición en el concurrido puente de mando ha sido un acto deliberado y no un error.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Tienes algo que ocultar a tus sirvientes?». {n}Marazhai te ofrece una tenue sonrisa, dejando bien claro que su aparición en el concurrido puente de mando ha sido un acto deliberado y no un error.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Auriez-vous quelque chose à cacher à vos serviteurs ? » {n}Marazhai vous adresse un fin sourire. Il ne fait plus aucun doute que cette entrevue publique sur le pont était parfaitement calculée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Auriez-vous quelque chose à cacher à vos serviteurs ? » {n}Marazhai vous adresse un fin sourire. Il ne fait plus aucun doute que cette entrevue publique sur le pont était parfaitement calculée.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Habt Ihr etwas vor Euren Dienern zu verbergen?" {n}Marazhai lächelt dich schmal an und lässt keinen Zweifel daran, dass sein Auftritt auf der überfüllten Brücke kein Versehen, sondern Absicht ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr etwas vor Euren Dienern zu verbergen?" {n}Marazhai lächelt dich schmal an und lässt keinen Zweifel daran, dass sein Auftritt auf der überfüllten Brücke kein Versehen, sondern Absicht ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前は従者どもに何か隠し事でもあるのか？」{n}マラズハイは薄く笑う。人の多く集まるブリッジに現れたのは、間違いなく意図的な行動だろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は従者どもに何か隠し事でもあるのか？」{n}マラズハイは薄く笑う。人の多く集まるブリッジに現れたのは、間違いなく意図的な行動だろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hizmetkârlarından saklayacak bir şeyin mi var?" {n}Marazhai sana yapmacık bir şekilde gülümsüyor. Kalabalık köprüde ortaya çıkmasının bir hata değil, kasıtlı bir hareket olduğuna dair hiçbir kuşku bırakmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you have something to hide from your servants?" {n}Marazhai smiles thinly at you, leaving no doubt that his appearance on the crowded bridge is a deliberate move, not a mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlarından saklayacak bir şeyin mi var?" {n}Marazhai, sana yapmacık bir şekilde gülümsüyor. Kalabalık köprüde ortaya çıkmasının bir hata değil, kasıtlı bir hareket olduğuna dair hiçbir kuşku bırakmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
